First sight :3
I learned how to make Custom sights because I wanted an Alya Custom Sight. First post and wanted to share it for anyone else who might want it. #alyasometimeshidesherfeelingsinrussian #alya #anime

Clean dot sight

#all_tanks #simple #tank
Based on @WOJTEK885 Enhanced Tank Sight, only include essential information and a middle dot used to aim on the screen.

  • Works with all tanks.
  • Works with all modes: AB, RB and SB.
  • Configurable sight instructions in the files for your special needs: dot size, text size, color, etc
  • eSports Ready!

Known issues:

  • Texts, dots and other stuffs may appears smaller on some tanks using high velo ammo, this is Gaijin's issue, not caused by the script. You can create a copy ...

Simple sight good foor sniping, laser-rangefinder recommended!

#simple #sniping #all_tanks #universal

я вернулся с подарком. автор - hayabusa(vert_320)

I came back with a gift. author - hayabusa(vert_320)

#anime #original #sight

Made this Brazilian Miku sight, the files has 2 different zoom versions, put them both in > War Thunder\UserSights\all_tanks and enjoy!

#anime #alltanks #sight #miku

I made this sight based on Fern from Frieren, the archive has 2 version one is slighlty smalles in case you play higher zoom tanks, you can just put both in > War Thunder\UserSights\all_tanks and decide which feels better.

#anime #sight #alltanks

Прицельная сетка с Ако из Blue Archive, на скрине приближение 6х

Вторая работа от моего подвального челика (h1ckarqwwx) по заказу от @SHISHIRO_SAN

Так же вы можете писать мне в лс для заказа прицела type_alpha1 работаем мы на пару так что скорее всего заказ выполним быстро

Так же у меня есть свой полк, название - Sora no Otoshimono

#alltanks #bluearchieve #anime #amau_ako

Прицельная сетка с Коюки из Blue Archive, на скрине приближение 6х

И вот после марафона я взялся за работу, а если точнее нашёл себе подвального чувака который теперь рисует вместо меня, вот собственно его первый прицел скажем так стажировка так же скоро будет ещё один прицел но с Ако (дс челика h1ckarqwwx)

Так же вы можете писать мне в лс для заказа прицела type_alpha1 работаем мы на пару так что скорее всего заказ выполним быстро

Так же у меня есть свой полк, название - Sora no Otoshimono

#alltanks #bluearchieve #anime #kurosakikoyuki

PGO-7V for SPz BMP-1

I decided to make a sighting grid similar to the PGO-7V grid for fun

There are differences in the sight scale and combat corrections, I adapted them to the default sight

I plan to add a rangefinder scale soon.


#bmp1#spzbmp1 #pgo7 #pgo7v #бмп1#пго7 #пго7в

AK-74M from girls Frontline
available for all tanks
#ak74m#girlsfrontline#anime#alltanks#sight
#anime #hoshino #shiroko #bluearchive

Sight with AN-94 from Girls' Frontline.
It was made in the TurboWarp browser program.

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTION:
1. Download the Zip-file and unzip it.
2. Go to the root folder of the game, find the folder Usersights and paste the unzipped file into the folder All Tanks.
3. Launch the game. Enter Options > Common Battle Settings > Use alternative sight grid and choose AN94_smol. Repeat 3rd step choosing all tanks one by one in hangar to set the sight to every tank.
4. Enjoy!

If the Usersights folder is not displayed in the root folder of the game, then follow the third step from the...

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTION:
1. Download the Zip-file and unzip it.
2. Go to the root folder of the game, find the folder Usersights and paste the unzipped file into the folder All Tanks.
3. Launch the game. Enter Options > Common Battle Settings > Use alternative sight grid and choose M4_smoke. Repeat 3rd step choosing all tanks one by one in hangar to set the sight to every tank.
4. Enjoy!
